thread.title: Vikas Bhalla latest to enter Bigg Boss 9
thread.title_full: Vikas Bhalla latest to enter Bigg Boss 9 | Latest News & Updates at Daily News & Analysis

author: dna | From the print edition
title: Vikas Bhalla latest to enter Bigg Boss 9
text:
The latest name to get added to the list of pariticpants in Bigg Boss 9 is Vikas Bhalla.
Last seen in the serial Uttaran, Vikas has been doing films and TV intermittently. He is best remembered for his song Hai Dhuan from the album Awaara , which was a chart buster. He later sang Po Po picturised on Salman Khan, Sanjay Dutt and Ajay Devgn in Son Of Sardar .
The actor is known to be quite close to Salman and was even seen in a small role in Jai Ho . However, sources, say that his being a part of the show has nothing to do with Salman! Others who have been confirmed for the show include Sunil Grover aka Gutthi and Mohit Malhotra.
